item.description:
Dom V and the Swingout Big Band

Dom VTake a step back in time to the 1930′s and join us for a night of great swing music the way it used to be played. This big band, led by Domenic Valarioti, consists of twenty of Massachusetts’ finest musicians performing swing music that will transport you back to the time of our grandparents, when everybody danced to the big bands.

Dance Info:
Come enjoy yourself at Boston’s longest-running swing dance. The Boston Swing Dance Network has been running public swing dances with live music for over 25 years! The dances are held one Saturday per month, from September through July (except for December and January) usually the second Saturday, but not always. Please check our schedule or sign up on our email mailing list. The dances are held at

LOCATION:
The Armenian Cultural and Education Center (directions)
47 Nichols Ave (map)
Watertown, MA

Admission – $18, which includes a beginners’ lesson.
Student Discount – $15 (Show your current student ID)
Seniors (70+) – $15.

NEW TIMES
Beginners’ Lesson – starts at 7:45 pm. The fun-filled 45 minute lesson will get you swing dancing on the spot.
The band – plays from 8:30 to 11:30.

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Swing Dance Network May Dance
